mapper.select: SELECT KindID F_GAME_TYPE_ID, CONVERT(VARCHAR(13), CostTime, 120) F_CREATE_TIME, SUM(FangKa) F_CARD_COST, COUNT(0) F_OPEN_ROOM_NUM FROM QPTreasureDB.dbo.UserFangKaCost GROUP BY KindID, CONVERT(VARCHAR(13), CostTime, 120)

SELECT a.UserID userId, GameID gameId, Accounts accounts, KindID gameTypeId, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), CostTime, 120) + ' 00:00:00' createTime, SUM(FangKa) cardCost, COUNT(0) openRoomNum FROM QPTreasureDB.dbo.UserFangKaCost a INNER JOIN QPAccountsDB.dbo.AccountsInfo b ON a.UserID = b.UserID
and CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), CostTime, 120) >= CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), #{startDate}, 120)
and CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), CostTime, 120) <= CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), #{endDate}, 120)
GROUP BY a.UserID, GameID, Accounts, KindID, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), CostTime, 120)
